participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ledsch_seda_c_baplusavgall.Description: baplus rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) ACS

ledsch_seda_c_hsecdnec.Description: Information index between schools: Economically disadvantaged/Non ECD (county) the information theory index is computed as the average deviation of each student's school racial diversity from the district-wide racial diversity. Values of 0 indicate no segregation while values of 1 indicate complete segregation. See Theil (1972) for more information

ledsch_seda_c_hsflnfl.Description: Information index between schools: FRPL/Non FRPL (county) the information theory index is computed as the average deviation of each student's school racial diversity from the district-wide racial diversity. Values of 0 indicate no segregation while values of 1 indicate complete segregation. See Theil (1972) for more information

ledsch_seda_c_lninc50avgall.Description: log of median income, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) ACS

ledsch_seda_c_perasn.Description: percent asians in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perblk.Description: percent blacks in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perecd.Description: percent economically disadvantaged in the county (county) Ed Facts

ledsch_seda_c_perell.Description: % of all Students in County that are ELL (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perfl.Description: percent free lunch in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perfrl.Description: percent free or reduced lunch in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perhsp.Description: percent hispanics in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perind.Description: percent native americans in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perrl.Description: percent reduced lunch in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perspeced.Description: % of all Students in County that are Special Ed (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_perwht.Description: percent whites in the county (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_povertyavgall.Description: poverty rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) ACS

ledsch_seda_c_rsecdnec.Description: Relative Diversity index between schools: Economically disadvantaged/Non ECD (county) the relative diversity index captures ECD-non ECD differences in exposure to ECD students at the average ECD-non ECD student's school within the unit; for more information see Reardon and Firebaugh (2002)

ledsch_seda_c_rsflnfl.Description: Relative Diversity index between schools: FRPL/Non FRPL (county) the relative diversity index captures free lunch-not free lunch differences in exposure to free lunch students at the average free lunch/not free lunch student's school within the unit; for more information see Reardon and Firebaugh (2002)

ledsch_seda_c_rural.Description: % of Schools in County that are Rural (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_sesavgall.Description: ses composite, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) see SEDA documentation for more detailed information on the construction of the SES measures from the ACS

ledsch_seda_c_single_momavgall.Description: single mother HH rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) ACS

ledsch_seda_c_snapavgall.Description: snap receipt rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) ACS

ledsch_seda_c_suburb.Description: % of Schools in County that are Suburban (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_town.Description: % of Schools in County that are Town (county) CCD

ledsch_seda_c_unempavgall.Description: unemployment rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (county) ACS

ledsch_seda_c_urban.Description: % of Schools in County that are Urban (county) CCD
